name: Tic-Tac-Toe (OrbitNinja)
description:
Second game I made on Unity based on the UI tutorials. 

Feel free to leave feedback or comments on how I can improve. 

Have fun!

Info on the game

  • Simple two player game of tic-tac-toe
  • Player who rolled the highest will go first 
  • Whoever has the highest roll will get to pick if they want to be O or X. 
  • The rules of tic-tac-toe are simple, first player to get 3 of their pieces in a row wins. 
  • No solo play
